title: Is there any singer who doesn't know how to sing, but is still a singer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Practically every popular singer today doesn't know how to sing, unless you count screeching your voice out through your nose. Most of them have never taken a single voice lesson in their life, either. It's the so-called quality of voice and the connections they have that bring them widespread attention. There's a reason singers like Mariah Carey and Adele are struggling with vocal damage: they're using really unhealthy techniques that hurt their voices when used daily for several hours.

My opera-singer buddies tell me that I don't know how to sing. I can sing folk, pop, or rock songs OK, but not opera. So, for that group, I don't know how to sing. I'd say most of them would say the same about Bob Dylan, Jimi Hendrix, Peter Wolf, Leonard Cohen...
